sentences.en: Although he is impetuous, Ho Lung is very humble.
sentences.cn: 虽然贺龙性格急躁, 但是他很谦虚.

sentences.en: Before the flames of the fire - god, the impetuous warrior speedily retreated.
sentences.cn: 火神身上发出的烈焰烤得这位鲁莽的武士抱头逃窜.

sentences.en: He tended to react in a heated and impetuous way.
sentences.cn: 他往往反应过火，急躁冲动。

sentences.en: He's not really at all impetuous.
sentences.cn: 他确实不是感情用事的人.

sentences.en: It was an island of rare beauty - wild , impetuous lovely Bora Bora.
sentences.cn: 博拉博拉岛美得奇异——狂放而又可爱.

sentences.en: It was impetuous of her to do that.
sentences.cn: 她竟做那种事,真是鲁莽.

sentences.en: She is lively, impetuous and very warmhearted.
sentences.cn: 她愉快, 急燥而心地善良.

sentences.en: She might live to regret this impetuous decision.
sentences.cn: 她可能会一辈子为这个鲁莽的决定感到后悔。
她后悔自己做了冲动的决定.

sentences.en: She revealed her feelings in impetuous displays of spending.
sentences.cn: 她冲动地任意挥霍显露了她的感情.

sentences.en: The headstrong impetuous man rushed into things without forethought.
sentences.cn: 这个顽固的莽汉,不预先考虑,仓促行事.

sentences.en: Youngsters are usually more impetuous than old people.
sentences.cn: 年轻人常比老年人急躁.

trans.tran_cn: 冲动的， 鲁莽的，猛烈的， 迅疾的
trans.tran_en: tending to do things very quickly, without thinking carefully first, or showing this quality
